phrases.original: To authorize a new user to register for the Invites App, please complete the form below. This will send a clickable authorization link to the new user. Once they click on that link, they will be able to register.
phrases.translated: To authorize a new user to register for the Invites App, please complete the form below. This will send a clickable authorization link to the new user. Once they click on that link, they will be able to register.

phrases.original: This is a WhatsApp phone number
phrases.translated: This is a WhatsApp phone number

phrases.original: I hereby vouch that {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} is a member in good standing with the {CHURCH-NAME}.
phrases.translated: I hereby vouch that {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} is a member in good standing with the {CHURCH-NAME}.

phrases.original: I hereby vouch that the above person is a member in good standing with the {CHURCH-NAME}.

phrases.original: New user must be in the same church as me ({CHURCH-NAME}).
phrases.translated: New user must be in the same church as me ({CHURCH-NAME}).

phrases.original: User's mobile phone number is required
phrases.translated: User's mobile phone number is required

phrases.original: A valid phone number is required.
phrases.translated: A valid phone number is required.

phrases.original: A valid e-mail address is required.
phrases.translated: A valid e-mail address is required.

phrases.original: The Invites App:  You are invited to register!
phrases.translated: The Invites App:  You are invited to register!

phrases.original: {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} has invited you to use the Invites App. This app is a powerful tool for evangelism and follow up, created specifically for disciples in the Soldout Discipling Movement.
phrases.translated: {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} has invited you to use the Invites App. This app is a powerful tool for evangelism and follow up, created specifically for disciples in the Soldout Discipling Movement.

phrases.original: The Invites App lets you share your faith quickly and conveniently, by sending a digital invitation. It can help you stay organized in your follow up. It helps the people you share with to find, and even remember to attend, the events that you invite them to.
phrases.translated: The Invites App lets you share your faith quickly and conveniently, by sending a digital invitation. It can help you stay organized in your follow up. It helps the people you share with to find, and even remember to attend, the events that you invite them to.

phrases.original: If you decide to register, please do so by {DEADLINE-DATE} when the link below expires.
